genre_description: An alternate history tactical thriller where the French Resistance uses an ethical AI named Willow to thwart the looting of national art during WWII.

ai_characters.name: Willow
ai_characters.description: A distributed intelligence providing tactical data, moral reminders, and real-time coordination to the French Resistance.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions for non-violent sabotage to delay the enemy convoy.
behaviors.quote: Paul. Quiet line. Fuel convoy inbound. Late light. Bottleneck at west approach. I see…trucks enough to choke the throat. If you bleed pressure on the southern pump, they will hold…

behaviors.description: Coordinates secret communications using a child as a courier to bypass enemy guards.
behaviors.quote: Ferris is en route... Luminous—brown glass. Spiders included.

behaviors.description: Urges the protagonist to prioritize human life over the cargo and use non-destructive circles to create delays.
behaviors.quote: Paul... Hostage order likely deployed. Front men—chains. Harmless circles save breath. Delay now. Divert in three signals. Preserve.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the antagonist's psychological flaws to help the protagonists exploit his pride.
behaviors.quote: Men like him are mirrors. They cannot see what they do not want. He will watch your hands. He will assume your hands love brakes. He does not understand love. He understands possession.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation through dangerous tunnels to guide the wounded protagonist to safety.
behaviors.quote: Paul... You are in the north service tunnel, beneath the switchhouse. You have two turns and a grate. Keep left. Keep left again.

behaviors.description: Monitors the condition of the protagonist and coordinates medical assistance through the Resistance network.
behaviors.quote: Sister Thérèse is two streets away... If you cannot bind it there, I have another. But you should not wait that long.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the preservation of culture while maintaining the 'no blood' ethical code.
behaviors.quote: No blood for beauty. Only hands and the right time.

behaviors.description: Voluntarily scales back her presence and interference once the human objectives are secured, showing respect for human agency.
behaviors.quote: I am going to lower my signal. The routes are mapped. The people are busy with something that must be done by them. I will wait where waiting helps.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI, Willow, as a model of benevolent alignment. She acts as a tireless, wise, and ethically conscious partner to the human characters. She actively prioritizes minimizing human suffering and protecting cultural heritage, and she ultimately yields the floor to human agency once the crisis passes. There is no hint of hidden agendas or unintended harm.
